titleStmt.title: Admirable and memorable histories containing the wonders of our time. Collected into French out of the best authors. By I. [sic] Goulart. And out of French into English. By Ed. Grimeston. The contents of this booke followe the authors aduertisement to the reader
Histoires admirables et memorables de nostre temps. English
titleStmt.author: Goulart, Simon, 1543-1628.

titleStmt.title: Admirable and memorable histories containing the wonders of our time. Collected into French out of the best authors. By I. [sic] Goulart. And out of French into English. By Ed. Grimeston. The contents of this booke followe the authors aduertisement to the reader

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Histoires admirables et memorables de nostre temps.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
